statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); parent=$(basename "$(dirname "$cwd")"); current=$(basename "$cwd"); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.fileMode=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); printf "\033[01;34m%s\033[00m" "$parent/$current"; [ -n "$branch" ] && printf " \033[01;32m%s\033[00m" "$branch"; [ -n "$remaining" ] && printf " \033[01;36m%.0f%% remaining\033[00m" "$remaining"; echo
